TopicTitle: What Are Things You've Heard That Made You Facepalm?

Articles.Content:
> 
> That's not as insane as it sounds. IIRC, the Hubble was based on a US Spy satellite that looked down.

Well, looking at earth with the hubble isn't the insane part, it's that somehow its supposed to find a plane among thousands of square miles of ocean.

It's like having one single virus on a table and using a microscope to find it.

"FNAF 4 may not be the final game in the series" - Title of an article on some website I saw in a youtube video

What has the world come to......?

> 
> "FNAF 4 may not be the final game in the series" - Title of an article on some website I saw in a youtube video
> What has the world come to......?

Pardon my lack of popular knowledge, but what is FNAF?
Five Night's at Freddy's. A game with an absolutely horrible fanbase.

![hFbiRad.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/hFbiRad.jpg?1)

Aside from the fact that this is completely untrue, the caption says that "no one alive today has seen this", yet it is supposedly a photo.

> 
> Pardon my lack of popular knowledge, but what is FNAF?

Wh-wha? You managed to not know about it? Didn't the incredibly large amount of horribly made FNAF videos show up on YouTube over there or something?

![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

About FNAF 4 not being the last: FNAF 3 was supposed to be the last before. If FNAF 5 happens, I'll attempt to build a suborbital rocket made out of junkyard parts, that can reach a very high altitude. 

Without life support.

*(Jeez, there's going to be a movie about that darn thing already, why the heck keep the series alive? Scott Cawthon (HOW DARE HE CARRY THE NAME OF SCOTT, THIS IS BLASPHEMY AGAINST ALMIGHTY SCOTT MANLEY) has already spewed out 4 games in a year or something, will this horrible-game-making spree ever end?)*

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-06T16:14:49Z" title="08/06/2015 04:14  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 6, 2015</time> by windows\_x\_seven**

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/hFbiRad.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/hFbiRad.jpg?1)
> Aside from the fact that this is completely untrue, the caption says that "no one alive today has seen this", yet it is supposedly a photo.

Just what...

This is almost as ridiculous as that one time people thought you'd be able to see Jupiter.

> 
> Just what...
> This is almost as ridiculous as that one time people thought you'd be able to see Jupiter.

Nibiru (Planet X). Enough said.

A few months ago when I was talking to a friend about places where we like to go fishing. 

Me: "There's a big pond we used to go to, but now its dried up because of global warming and stuff." (I said this sarcastically, it was actually because a dam broke.)

Friend: "Wait, you believe in that stuff?"

Me: "What do you mean?"

Friend: "Well, I know like the Earth is warming up, and storms and droughts and everything, but didn't the Aztecs or the Mayans say..."

I stopped listening at that point. I don't talk to him anymore, though for reasons other than that.

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/hFbiRad.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/hFbiRad.jpg?1)
> Aside from the fact that this is completely untrue, the caption says that "no one alive today has seen this", yet it is supposedly a photo.

That sounds like the thing I saw once saying that Pluto and Jupiter would align behind our planet and cancel gravity or something like that.

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/hFbiRad.jpg?1](http://i.imgur.com/hFbiRad.jpg?1)
> Aside from the fact that this is completely untrue, the caption says that "no one alive today has seen this", yet it is supposedly a photo.

I was just going to post about this. And it's not JUST this photo. This is simply the latest version of a 'chain letter' that has been circulating for decades. I remember a variant of it being handed to be that was printed out on a dot matrix.

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mars_hoax](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mars_hoax)

Not only does it make no sense for this email to circulate every year, since Mars is only in opposition with Earth every TWO years, but comeon... if this ever really happened, we'd be in some serious shizzle.

This story actually ticks me off even MORE than moon landing conspiracy theories because IMO, it requires an even greater blatant disregard for logic. I can't count how many times I've had to refute people who excitedly tell me about this Mars event.

> 
> if this ever really happened, we'd be in some serious shizzle.

I can feel the tidal forces already...

By the way, I'd like to share this:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/EzoK6ct5A9g?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

![crying-waterfalls.gif](http://mashable.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/crying-waterfalls.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-07T00:24:19Z" title="08/07/2015 12:24  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 7, 2015</time> by windows\_x\_seven**
'Education, Healthcare and the overall wellbeing of the 99% are important. But budget surpluses are importanter.'

"Whats larger, your 1/4 lb burger or your 1/2 lb burger?"

"What has more chicken strips in it, the 3 piece meal or the 6 piece meal?"

Both of these are legitimate questions asked by a customer when I was working.

Our government is face-palm with it's own life.

> 
> When I'm not hungry I cut the chicken into 2 pieces.
> When I'm hungry and want to eat more, I cut the chicken into 6 pieces.

> 
> Came across [this](http://thetruthwins.com/archives/44-reasons-why-evolution-is-just-a-fairy-tale-for-adults)... It's all either stupid sophisms, misquoted, bad sources, false, or plain BS. It's particularly funny from #30 to#35. I Also laughed/facepalmed when i read the very end of the article with the author's bio...

I immediately closed the window as soon as I saw the title "refuting" evolution with the utmost confidence, right above a blatantly wrong picture about how evolution is supposed to work.

> 
> **Please stay away from the creationism topic, it's religious content and is against the rules.**

Quoted for continued relevance.

> 
> ["Mother refuses to damage her BMW in order to rescue her trapped son."](http://www.aol.com/article/2015/07/14/mom-refuses-to-damage-her-bmw-in-order-to-rescue-her-trapped-son/21209143/)
> Yep.

Maybe that means she isn't damaging her BMW because if she did damage her BMW, her son would not be rescued. Mother refuses to damage her BMW, in order to rescue her trapped son.

THe only bad thing would be if it was Mother refuses to damage her BMW to rescue her trapped son.

See, logic! I swear it makes sense! English too! THe most sensible language! Don't hurt me. D:

This can't possibly be real. I don't believe it. It's like a train crash, you can't look away.

This actually made its way into one of the largest national newspapers here. Eight years later, they still haven't removed the article from the online edition.

[http://www.jutarnji.hr/dva-mjeseca-na-zvjezdanom-nebu/232952/](http://www.jutarnji.hr/dva-mjeseca-na-zvjezdanom-nebu/232952/)

> 
> ***zelda is a ripoff from minecraft***

Holy....

My ears hurt from the shear amount of the F-word that this kid used. Like seriously, he can't be older than 12. His voice cracks when he swears. XD

I can't even. "Zelda is a ripoff of \*\*\*\* minecraft. Wanna know why, you \*\*\*\* \*\*\*\*? What do you do in \*\*\*\* Zelda? You \*\*\*\* swing a \*\*\*\* sword around. JUST LIKE IN \*\*\*\* MINECRAFT. and you go around, and kill \*\*\*\* monsters, and \*\*\*\* explore worlds. And where have I seen this before? Oh yeah, \*\*\*\* MINECRAFT!!!" 

He had to take a breather every 2 minutes from all the screaming and swearing.

 to mods, all swear words were replaced by \*\*\*\*, with no first letter or correct number of characters, that way it isn't obvious what he said, and anyone who doesn't know swear words won't be able to tell what it is at all.

> 
> [**This channel.**](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUTXCm-AeXZkASBns1cfCMw/videos)

JUST LIKE IN \*\*\*\* MINECRAFT. and you go around, and kill \*\*\*\* monsters, and \*\*\*\* explore worlds. And where have I seen this before? Oh yeah, \*\*\*\* MINECRAFT!!!" 
> 
> He had to take a breather every 2 minutes from all the screaming and swearing.

His channel was confirmed to be a satire of minecraft and FNAF fans some time ago on [Reddit.](https://www.reddit.com/r/CringeAnarchy/comments/3cbgdv/a_well_justified_intelligent_statement_about/csu17mn)

Also

>replying to 27 day old posts
